summary: Socialite Carol Morgan romps through the depression and her wealth while breaking up with Bill Wade and getting back together with him.

Mack|Geneva Mitchell|William H. O'Brien|Marshall Ruth|Evelyn Selbie|Ben Taggart|Phil Tead|Charles Williams
keywords: rich girl poor boy|taming of the shrew|manipulative female|kept woman|brother brother relationship
title: Mujer infiel
